price: 23.Yalli isi ginok abeh yaniimik messerima, abeenimik usun esserimaanâ kal.
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
